summary: This is a certificate of authenticity from Teresa Rodelo, an Amazon employee, declaring that documents produced by Amazon in response to a law enforcement request are authentic business records. It serves to authenticate evidence for legal proceedings.

persons.name: Teresa Rodelo
persons.role: Manager, Law Enforcement Response Team at Amazon
persons.context: She is an Amazon employee who provides a sworn declaration certifying the authenticity of documents produced by Amazon in response to a law enforcement request.

events.title: Execution of Certificate of Authenticity
events.description: Teresa Rodelo signs a certificate of authenticity declaring that documents produced by Amazon for a law enforcement request are authentic business records.

keyFacts: Amazon produced documents in response to a law enforcement request related to the Epstein case.
Teresa Rodelo, an Amazon manager, certifies under penalty of perjury that the documents are authentic business records.
The certificate was executed on July 2, 2020, in Seattle, Washington.
